_header: As far as hope will in length
Subjects: Henry VI, prayer to; prayers, special occaisions
_description: Prayer to Henry VI — two stanzas rhyme royal

BodDonE120.First Lines:
As far as hope will yn lengtheOn the kyng henry I fix myn
                    mynde…
BodDonE120.Last Lines:
…Now for þi pety to hym þat all schall demePray for
                    me thy seruaunt & pilgreme
BodDonE120.Editions:
Collier,  John Payne,
                        ed.  
             Trevelyan Papers prior to A.D. 1558.
Camden Society
         o.s. 67 (1857): 59-60.
